entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
